question: Posted By Carol S on November 28, 1998 at 19:27:36:My son-in-law (age 24) has Nephrogenic Diabetes Insipidus---he has had a suprapubic catheter placed but has constant infections---each one worse than the last---is there a solution or product that can be put into the bag to prevent the infections?
title: Suprapubic Catheter
